skill.Name: Acrobatics
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are skilled at acrobatics.

power.Name: Swift Reflexes
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You gain a +5 bonus to your DV when flinching away from missile attacks.

power.Name: Spry
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You gain a +2 bonus to your DV.

power.Name: Jump
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You jump into an unoccupied square within range 2. You cannot jump over a square occupied by a creature, unless you have an ability (such as flight) that augments your jump.

power.Name: Tumble
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You gain a +1 bonus to your DV. Additionally, Juke's cooldown is reduced to 20.

skill.Name: Axe
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are skilled with axes.

power.Name: Axe Proficiency
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You get +2 to hit with axes.

power.Name: Cleave
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Whenever you hit an opponent with an axe, there's a 75% chance you cleave their armor, giving them a -1 penalty to their AV. This penalty can stack a number of times up to half your Str modifier, rounded up, +1 on a critical hit.

power.Name: Charging Strike
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]When you charge with an axe and hit, if you cleave their armor, they get an additional -1 penalty to their AV. If you have Dismember, your chance to dismember when charging with an axe is doubled. When you charge with a cudgel and hit, you automatically daze your opponent.

power.Name: Dismember
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Activated; cooldown 30. Axe attack. If you hit and penetrate, you dismember one of their limbs at random and they start bleeding (1-2 damage per turn. toughness save; difficulty 35). Additionally, your axe attacks that penetrate have a percentage chance to dismember: 3% for one-handed axes and 6% for two-handed axes.

power.Name: Hook and Drag
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Activated; cooldown 50. You grab an opponent's limb with the heel of your axe. If successful, you pull your opponent with you as you move and make a free attack with your axe. Your opponent gets a chance to resist the move (strength save; difficulty 20 + your Str modifier) and a chance to break free at the start of their turn (same save). Lasts for 9 rounds or until you dismember the opponent.

power.Name: Decapitate
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Heads are added to the list of possible limbs you can dismember. Chopping off the only head of a creature kills them instantly. If the creature has multiple heads, they start bleeding profusely (2-3 damage per turn. toughness save; difficulty 35).

power.Name: Berserk!
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Activated; cooldown 100. You enter a blood frenzy, and for 5 rounds your chance to dismember with axe attacks is 100%. To use Berserk, Dismember must be off cooldown, and using Berserk puts Dismember on cooldown.

skill.Name: Bow and Rifle
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are skilled with bows and rifles.

power.Name: Steady Hands
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]For the purpose of determining your accuracy with bows and rifles, your agility is treated as if it were 4 points higher.

power.Name: Draw a Bead
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You spend a turn to draw a bead on a target and mark it. Whenever you fire at a marked target with a bow or rifle, your agility is treated as if it were 2 points higher for the purpose of determining your accuracy. You may only mark one target at a time. Targets get unmarked if you lose vision of them.

power.Name: Suppressive Fire
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You fire at a marked target. If your shot penetrates, your target is suppressed and can't move for 3-5 rounds. Then your target is unmarked.

power.Name: Flattening Fire
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]As long as your target is surrounded by 6 or more solid obstacles, Suppressive Fire is upgraded to Flattening Fire. Flattening Fire also knocks your target prone and disarms them.

power.Name: Wounding Fire
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You fire at a marked target. For each penetration on each shot that hits, your target bleeds 1 point of damage per round (save: 20 + max damage of the weapon). Then your target is unmarked.

power.Name: Disorienting Fire
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]As long as your target can't see or hear any faction allies, Wounding Fire is upgraded to Disorienting Fire. Disorienting Fire also reduces your target's DV and MA by 4.

power.Name: Sure Fire
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You fire at a marked target with no accuracy penalty (the accuracy of your weapon still matters). Then your target is unmarked.

power.Name: Beacon Fire
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]As long as your target is flaming, luminous, or phosphorescent, Sure Fire is upgraded to Beacon Fire. Beacon Fire shots are also treated as critical hits.

power.Name: Ultra Fire
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Cooldown 100. You fire at a marked target. Your shot combines the effects of all the other Fire powers you have.

skill.Name: Cooking and Gathering
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are skilled at cooking and gathering meal ingredients.

power.Name: Meal Preparation
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]While at a campfire, you can cook from recipes, choose up to two ingredients to cook with, and preserve fresh foods. Meals cooked from recipes bestow special status effects. Meals cooked with selected ingredients bestow dynamically-generated status effects. Preserved foods are used as meal ingredients.

power.Name: Harvestry
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You can harvest fresh ingredients and other usable parts from plants.

power.Name: Butchery
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You can butcher fresh ingredients and other usable parts from animal corpses.

power.Name: Spicer
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]When you choose ingredients to cook with, you can choose up to three instead of two. Meals cooked with three ingredients bestow more powerful status effects.

power.Name: Carbide Chef
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Whenever you gain a level, and 5% of the time you explore a new map, you become inspired for two days. While inspired, the next time you cook a meal by choosing ingredients, you get a choice of three dynamically-generated effects to apply. You create a recipe for the chosen effect.

skill.Name: Cudgel
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are skilled with crushing and bludgeoning weapons.

power.Name: Cudgel Proficiency
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You get +2 to hit with cudgels.

power.Name: Bludgeon
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Whenever you hit with a cudgel, there's a 50% chance to daze your opponent (-4 int, -4 agi, -10 movespeed) for 3-4 rounds. If you daze a dazed opponent, they're stunned for 1 round instead (cannot take actions and 0 DV).

power.Name: Charging Strike
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]When you charge with a cudgel and hit, you automatically daze your opponent. When you charge with an axe and hit, if you cleave their armor, they get an additional -1 penalty to their AV. If you have Dismember, your chance to dismember when charging with an axe is doubled.

power.Name: Conk
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Activated; cooldown 10. You make an attack with a cudgel at an adjacent opponent. If you hit, you automatically daze them for 3-4 rounds. Dazing a dazed opponent stuns them. Conking a stunned opponent instead knocks them unconscious for 30-40 rounds (unconscious opponents wake up dazed when they take damage).

power.Name: Backswing
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Whenever you make a cudgel attack with your primary hand, there's a 25% chance you make an additional free attack with the same hand.

power.Name: Slam
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Activated; cooldown 50. You make an attack with a cudgel at an adjacent opponent with +1 to your penetration roll. If you hit, you slam your opponent backwards up to 3 spaces, pushing other creatures and breaking through walls if their AVs are less than 5 times your Strength modifier. Opponents who get pushed are stunned for 1 round plus an additional round for each space pushed. Opponents who are pushed through or against walls take extra weapon damage for each wall. Gigantic opponents don't get pushed but are still stunned for 1 round. Destroys a wall or door if its AV is under 5 times your Strength modifier.

power.Name: Demolish
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Activated; cooldown 100. For the next 5 rounds, your chance to daze with cudgel attacks is 100% and Slam has no cooldown. To use Demolish, Slam must be off cooldown, and using Demolish puts Slam on cooldown.

skill.Name: Customs and Folklore
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are familiar with the customs and folklore of Qud.

power.Name: Tactful
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Whenever you begin the water ritual with a new creature, you gain 25 bonus reputation. If you purchase this power after you treat with a creature, you gain 25 bonus reputation the next time you treat with them.

power.Name: Trash Divining
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Whenever you rifle through trash, there's a 5% chance you piece together clues and learn a random secret.

skill.Name: Single Weapon Fighting
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You may choose not to make offhand attacks in exchange for mastery with a single weapon.

power.Name: Opportune Attacks
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Whenever you score a critical hit with a melee weapon while single-weapon fighting, the cooldowns of up to two random weapon or shield skills are immediately refreshed.

power.Name: Weapon Expertise
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Whenever you make a melee attack while single-weapon fighting, there's a 50% chance you immediately make a second attack for free.

power.Name: Penetrating Strikes
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]While single-weapon fighting, your melee attacks always penetrate one extra time.

power.Name: Weapon Mastery
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Whenever you make a melee attack while single-weapon fighting, immediately make a second attack for free.

skill.Name: Multiweapon Fighting
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are skilled at multiweapon fighting. Your chance to attack with offhand weapons is increased.

power.Name: Flurry
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Activated; cooldown 60. You make an attack with every weapon-wielding limb, including extra limbs granted by mutation or technology.

power.Name: Multiweapon Proficiency
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Your chance to strike with each of your offhand weapons is increased by 20%.

power.Name: Multiweapon Expertise
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Your chance to strike with each of your offhand weapons is increased by 35%.

power.Name: Multiweapon Mastery
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Your chance to strike with each of your offhand weapons is increased by 50%.

skill.Name: Endurance
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are skilled at enduring harsh conditions and situations.

power.Name: Shake It Off
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Each round you are dazed or stunned, you have a (Toughness-10)% chance to shake off the effect. You also take 25% less damage from poison.

power.Name: Swimming
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Reduces the movement speed penalty when swimming (normally 50 points) by 25 points.

power.Name: Poison Tolerance
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You take 25% less damage from poison.

power.Name: Weathered
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You take 15% less damage from heating and cooling effects. Additionally, the severities of effects that change your temperature are reduced by 15%.

power.Name: Juicer
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You may ingest one additional tonic without it reacting adversely to the tonic you have already ingested.

power.Name: Calloused
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Your natural AV improves to 1.

power.Name: Longstrider
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You may sprint for an additional 10 turns.

skill.Name: Physic
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are skilled at physicking.

power.Name: Staunch Wounds
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Bandages you apply are much more effective at stopping bleeding.

power.Name: Nostrums
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You can treat bleeding, poison, illness, and disease onset for you and your companions at a campfire.

power.Name: Amputate Limb
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You can voluntarily amputate your own limbs and the limbs of infected companions.

power.Name: Apothecary
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Healing tonics you apply last an extra round.

skill.Name: Heavy Weapon
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are skilled with heavy weapons.

power.Name: Strapping Shoulders
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You shoulder your weapons more effectively. Heavy weapons count for half their weight toward your encumbrance.

power.Name: Tank
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You suffer no movement penalty while wielding a heavy weapon.

power.Name: Sweep
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You fire 5 shots with your heavy weapon, sweeping over a 90 degree cone. Your heavy weapon is reloaded before each shot.

skill.Name: Long Blade
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are skilled with long thrusting and slashing blades.

power.Name: Long Blade Proficiency
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You gain access to two stances. Aggressive stance: With a long blade in your primary hand, your long blade and short blade attacks gain +1 to your penetration roll but -2 to hit. Defensive stance: While wielding a long blade in your primary hand, you gain +2 DV.

power.Name: Lunge
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Activated; cooldown 15. Aggressive stance: Lunge through an empty space at an opponent and attack with +2 to your penetration roll. You must move through the empty space. Defensive stance: Attack an opponent then lunge backward 2 spaces. Dueling stance: Attack an opponent with +1 to your penetration roll. The attack is guaranteed to hit and penetrate at least once.

power.Name: Swipe
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Activated; cooldown 15. Aggressive stance: Make an attack against all adjacent opponents. Defensive stance: Push all adjacent creatures back 1 space and attempt to trip opponents (strength/agility save; difficulty 30). Dueling stance: Attack an opponent and attempt to disarm them (strength save; difficulty 25 + your Agi modifier). The attack is guaranteed to hit and penetrate at least once.

power.Name: Dueling Stance
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You gain access to dueling stance. While wielding a long blade in your primary hand, you get +2 to hit with long blades and short blades.

power.Name: Improved Aggressive Stance
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Your penetration bonus in aggressive stance is increased to +2, but your to-hit penalty is increased to -3.

power.Name: Improved Defensive Stance
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Your DV bonus in defensive stance is increased to +3.

power.Name: Improved Dueling Stance
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Your to-hit bonus in dueling stance is increased to +3.

power.Name: En Garde!
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Activated; cooldown 100. For the next 10 rounds, Lunge and Swipe have no cooldown.

skill.Name: Persuasion
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are skilled at convincing others.

power.Name: Menacing Stare
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You stare down a nearby opponent and send them fleeing in terror.

power.Name: Intimidate
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Cooldown 50. You try to terrify adjacent, hostile creatures (1d8 + [Ego modifier] penetration roll vs. MA). On success, a frightened creature flees from you for 6d4 rounds.

power.Name: Berate
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Cooldown 50. You shame a nearby creature for 6d6 rounds, giving it a -4 penalty to DV, to-hit, Ego, Willpower and a -10% penalty to quickness.

power.Name: Snake Oiler
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]For purposes of bartering, your ego is treated as though it were 4 points higher.

power.Name: Proselytize
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You persuade an intelligent creature to join you.

power.Name: Inspiring Presence
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Your words embolden your companions.

skill.Name: Pistol
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are skilled with pistols of various kinds.

power.Name: Steady Hand
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]For purposes of determining your accuracy with pistols, your agility is treated as if it were 4 points higher.

power.Name: Akimbo
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Whenever you make a ranged attack while wielding multiple guns, you fire a shot with each of them.

power.Name: Weak Spotter
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are 5% more likely to score critical hits with pistols (standard chance is 5%).

power.Name: Sling and Run
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You receive no accuracy penalties for firing pistols while running.

power.Name: Disarming Shot
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You have an agility-based chance to disarm your opponent when you score a hit with a pistol.

power.Name: Dead Shot
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Critical hits you score with pistols are more deadly.

power.Name: Empty the Clips
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Cooldown 200. For 20 rounds, firing a pistol only takes half a round instead of a full round.

power.Name: Fastest Gun in the Rust
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]The action cost of firing pistols is reduced by 25%.

skill.Name: Self-discipline
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are skilled at maintaining self-discipline.

power.Name: Meditate
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]While meditating, you regenerate three times as fast, and negative status effects wear out three times as fast. The only action you can take while meditating is Wait. You stop meditating if you take damage in a single round exceeding (Willpower*3)-60. If you rest for 10 or more turns, you automatically begin meditating.

power.Name: Fasting Way
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You hunger and thirst at one-half the normal rate. Metabolic effects from meals last twice as long.

power.Name: Iron Mind
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Each round you are confused, you have a (Willpower-10)% chance to shake off the effect.

power.Name: Lionheart
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Each round you are terrified, you have a (Willpower-10)% chance to shake off the effect.

power.Name: Conatus
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You may sprint for an additional 10 turns.

power.Name: Mind over Body
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You hunger and thirst at one-sixth rate. Metabolic effects from meals last six times as long. You suffer no penalty for becoming famished.

skill.Name: Shield
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are skilled at wielding shields.

power.Name: Block
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]As long as you wield a shield, there is a 50% chance you block one melee attack per round. When you block an attack, you add the shield's AV bonus to your AV for that attack. If you equip multiple shields, the one block per round limit is per shield, and you only can attempt to block a given attack once, using your best usable shield.

power.Name: Shield Slam
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Activated; cooldown 40. You attempt to knock an opponent down and deal (Str modifier)d2 + your shield's AV bonus in damage. Your opponent gets a chance to resist (strength save; difficulty 20 + your Str modifier). Whenever you charge an opponent with a shield equipped, you get a free Shield Slam attack against them.

power.Name: Deft Blocking
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Your chance to block with a shield improves to 75%.

power.Name: Swift Blocking
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You may block an additional attack per round per shield.

power.Name: Staggering Block
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Whenever you block an opponent's attack, there is a (Strength*2)-35% chance that your opponent is stunned for 1d2 rounds.

power.Name: Shield Wall
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]For the next three rounds, you automatically block all incoming melee attacks (may not be used with bucklers).

skill.Name: Short Blade
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are skilled with small one-handed knives and blades.

power.Name: Short Blade Expertise
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You get +1 to hit with short blades. Also, the action costs of attacking with a short blade in your primary hand is reduced by 25%.

power.Name: Bloodletter
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Your short blade attacks that penetrate have a 75% chance to cause your opponent to bleed (0-1 damage per turn. toughness save; difficulty 20 + your Agi modifier). The opponent saves to stop bleeding each round, and the save difficulty decreases by 1 each round. This effect can stack a number of times equal to 1 plus your Agi modifier.

power.Name: Jab
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Whenever you make an offhand attack with a short blade, you immediately make another attack with that same weapon. Flurry attacks do not trigger this.

power.Name: Hobble
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You make an attack with a short blade in your primary hand, looking for a weak spot in your opponent's armor. If you hit, you penetrate exactly once and hobble them (-50% movespeed for 16-20 rounds).

power.Name: Pointed Circle
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Whenever you juke an opponent while wielding a short blade in your primary hand, you make a free attack. If you have Bloodletter, the attack's chance to cause bleeding is 100%.

power.Name: Rejoinder
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Once per turn, when an opponent misses you with a melee attack, there's a 40% chance you make a free attack with a short blade you're wielding.

power.Name: Shank
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Activated; cooldown 10 (primary) or 20 (offhand). You make a melee attack with a short blade in your primary hand (preferred) or offhand. If you hit, the attack gets +2 to penetration rolls for each negative status effect your opponent suffers from.

skill.Name: Tactics
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are aware of basic combat tactics.

power.Name: Hurdle
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You receive no penalty to your DV while sprinting and can jump without interrupting your sprint.

power.Name: Deft Throwing
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Your throw range is increased by 3 and your throw variance is halved when throwing at a target inside your throw range.

power.Name: Charge
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You charge forward two or three squares and perform a melee attack with +1 to your penetration roll.

power.Name: Kickback
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Whenever you fire a missile weapon at a target in melee range, you attempt to kick the target backwards.

power.Name: Juke
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Activated; cooldown 40. You move one square at no action cost. You may swap squares with a hostile opponent.

skill.Name: Tinkering
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are skilled at examining, building, repairing and modding artifacts.

power.Name: Gadget Inspector
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are much more successful at examining artifacts, and you can deploy wiring.

power.Name: Disassemble
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You can disassemble scrap and artifacts for bits. You get the most significant bit from the item schematic plus a 50% chance to receive each remaining bit.

power.Name: Reverse Engineer
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Whenever you disassemble an item, you have a 25% chance to learn how to build the item. If the item was modded, you also have a 15% chance per mod to learn the mod.

power.Name: Scavenger
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Whenever you step over garbage, you astutely rifle through it and occasionally discover scrap. Additionally, you harvest extra scrap from robots you destroy.

power.Name: Repair
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You may repair broken items with Bits.

power.Name: Deploy Turret
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You may deploy missile weapons as static turrets.

power.Name: Lay Mine / Set Bomb
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You may lay down grenades as mines or set them as bombs.

power.Name: Tinker I
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You may build items from low-tier schematics and you get 1 free schematic. You can also recharge energy cells and capacitors.

power.Name: Tinker II
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You may build items from medium-tier schematics and you get 1 free schematic.

power.Name: Tinker III
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You may build items from high-tier schematics and you get 1 free schematic.

skill.Name: Wayfaring
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You are skilled at wilderness survival.

power.Name: Make Camp
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Start a campfire for cooking meals and preserving foods.

power.Name: Mind's Compass
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Doubles the chance of regaining your bearings when you are lost. Reduces chance of getting lost by about 15%. You travel on the world map twice as quickly.

power.Name: Wilderness Lore: Flower Fields
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Doubles the chance of interesting encounters while traveling through the flower fields on the world map. Reduces the chance of getting lost in the flower fields from base 12% to 1%. On the world map, you travel through the flower fields twice as quickly.

power.Name: Wilderness Lore: Marshes
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Doubles the chance of interesting encounters while traveling through the salt marshes and watervine fields on the world map. Reduces the chance of getting lost in the salt marshes and watervine fields from base 12% to 1%. On the world map, you travel through the salt marshes and watervine fields twice as quickly.

power.Name: Wilderness Lore: Hills and Mountains
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Doubles the chance of interesting encounters while traveling through the hills and mountains on the world map. Reduces the chance of getting lost in the hills and mountains from base 12% to 1%. On the world map, you travel through the hills and mountains twice as quickly.

power.Name: Wilderness Lore: Canyons
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Doubles the chance of interesting encounters while traveling through the desert canyons on the world map. Reduces the chance of getting lost in the desert canyons from base 12% to 1%. On the world map, you travel through the desert canyons twice as quickly.

power.Name: Wilderness Lore: Salt Dunes
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Doubles the chance of interesting encounters while traveling through the salt dunes on the world map. Reduces the chance of getting lost in the salt dunes from base 10% to 1%. On the world map, you travel through the salt dunes twice as quickly.

power.Name: Wilderness Lore: Jungles
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Doubles the chance of interesting encounters while traveling through the jungles on the world map. Reduces the chance of getting lost in the jungles from base 12% to 1%. On the world map, you travel through the jungles twice as quickly.

power.Name: Wilderness Lore: Rivers and Lakes
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Doubles the chance of interesting encounters while traveling across rivers and lakes on the world map. Reduces the chance of getting lost in rivers and lakes from base 12% to 1%. On the world map, you travel across rivers and lakes twice as quickly.

power.Name: Wilderness Lore: Ruins
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Doubles the chance of interesting encounters while traveling through chrome ruins on the world map. Reduces the chance of getting lost in ruins from base 12% to 1%. On the world map, you travel through ruins twice as quickly.

skill.Name: Nonlinearity
skill.Description: [届：\TODÖ]You extend.

power.Name: Tomorrowful
power.Description: [届：\TODÖ]Your precognitive visions last twice as long.
